# Third-Party Code Attribution

This directory contains code adapted from external sources used in our radar data processing pipeline.

---

## Source Repository

**Original Author**: Ilya Savenko  
**Repository**: [radar-bird-segmentation](https://github.com/ilyasa332/radar-bird-segmentation)  
**Access Date**: [January 15, 2024]  
**License**: MIT License (see `LICENSE.txt`)  
**Status**: Open-source research code

---

## Components Used

Utility functions for radar data preprocessing:
- `RadarScan()`: HDF to PPI image conversion
- `getFileTime()`, `groupTimewise()`, `getSaveDir()`, `getFolderDir()`: File handling utilities

All code is used unmodified from the original repository.

---

## Acknowledgment

We thank Ilya Savenko for making his radar processing utilities publicly available under the MIT License, which greatly facilitated the development of our migration monitoring pipeline.

---
